attributes.action: Add Scotttish Gaelic as a supported languages on digital game storefronts
attributes.additional_details: Scottish Gaelic is a recognised language by the Scottish Government and the European Charter for Regional or Minority Languages. Scottish Gaelic are in danger of dying off, and with little to no support from the Scottish government as of right now
attributes.background: This is a attempt to give them some life, and help gain international attention and new learners from around the world

rejection.details: If you'd like the Scottish Government to introduce additional measures to support Scottish Gaelic, you could petition the Scottish Parliament: https://www.parliament.scot/contact-us
